text: What do you mean by “The mobile is not loading as it should”. It looks to be loading fine to me…

I meant that I set the video height on mobile to be 2000 px. The video is meant to be full screen 1920 x 1080 to fit the mobile screen, with the 'our partners' section underneath, but the lower third or so of the video is getting cut off.

When you open the webpage on a desktop, the video is full screen and then you scroll down to see the rest of the page. I wanted the same effect for the mobile view.
